mapper.select: select sli.id, sli.school_id, sli.discipline_code, sli.`type`, sli.score, sli.template_flag, sli.`year`, sli.admissions, ss.name as schoolName, ss.address, ss.city, ss.province, ss.manage, ss.`level`, di.name as disciplineName, di.employment, di.remark from score_line_info sli left join sys_school ss on (ss.id = sli.school_id) left join discipline_info di on (di.code = sli.discipline_code) where 1 = 1 AND sli.school_id = #{schoolId}

select sli.id, sli.school_id, sli.discipline_code, sli.`type`, sli.score, sli.template_flag, sli.`year`, sli.admissions, ss.name as schoolName, ss.area, ss.manage, ss.`level`, di.name as disciplineName, di.employment from score_line_info sli left join sys_school ss on (ss.id = sli.school_id) left join discipline_info di on (di.code = sli.discipline_code) where 1 = 1 AND sli.template_flag = '1' order by sli.`year` desc
